Uses of Class
com.shaft.gui.element.ElementActions

Packages that use ElementActions 
Package Description
com.shaft.gui.element  

  • Uses of ElementActions in com.shaft.gui.element

    Methods in com.shaft.gui.element that return ElementActions 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ElementActions ElementActions.click​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Clicks on a certain element using Selenium WebDriver, or JavaScript
    ElementActions ElementActions.dragAndDrop​(org.openqa.selenium.By sourceElementLocator, org.openqa.selenium.By destinationElementLocator)
    Drags the source element and drops it onto the destination element using javascript
    ElementActions ElementActions.dragAndDropByOffset​(org.openqa.selenium.By sourceElementLocator, int xOffset, int yOffset)
    Drags the source element and drops it onto the determined offset
    ElementActions ElementActions.hover​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator)
    Hovers over target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.hoverAndClick​(java.util.List<org.openqa.selenium.By> hoverElementLocators, org.openqa.selenium.By clickableElementLocator)
    Hovers over the hoverElements in sequence then clicks the clickableElement
    ElementActions ElementActions.keyPress​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, org.openqa.selenium.Keys keys)
    Sends a keypress to the target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.select​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Selects an element from a dropdown list using its displayed text
    ElementActions ElementActions.type​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
    ElementActions ElementActions.typeAppend​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Appends the required string into the target element, regardless of the current text value.
    ElementActions ElementActions.typeFileLocationForUpload​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String absoluteFilePath)
    Types the required file path into an input[type='file'] button, to successfully upload the target file.
    ElementActions ElementActions.typeSecure​(org.openqa.selenium.By elementLocator, java.lang.String text)
    Checks if there is any text in an element, clears it, then types the required string into the target element.
